tokens.text: validates pack icon format, size, and placement

title: Pack Icon
description: Validates behavior and resource pack icons (pack_icon.png) for correct format, size, and placement. The icon is shown in the pack selection screens.

fields.title: Missing Icon
fields.description: Warning when no pack_icon.png file is found in the pack root. A pack icon helps players identify your content.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the pack path missing the icon

fields.title: Multiple Icons
fields.description: Warning when multiple pack icon files are found. Only one pack_icon.png should exist in each pack root.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the paths to the multiple icon files

fields.title: Invalid Format
fields.description: Error when the pack icon file is not a valid PNG image. Ensure the file is properly formatted.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the path to the invalid icon file

fields.title: Invalid Size
fields.description: Warning when the pack icon is not the expected dimensions. Pack icons should be square (typically 256x256 pixels for best display).
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the actual dimensions found
